name: High Society
description:
"High Society" is the first game in which you can start a startup in the modern era, you will become the most successfully entrepreneur and take control of the business empire from nobody, surrounded by the world's richest beauty. You can experience all kinds of business activities in the game, the Chamber of Commerce Alliance, stock appreciation, fascinating story and you are the president, the richest man.

[Beginning with nobody, promoting yourself to the somebody who has the highest social status]
Entrepreneurship, negotiation, chamber of commerce, competition for the mall, real return to the president's entrepreneurial road, experience the entrepreneurial road in the game.

[Villa, supercar and beauty all belong to you]
Own a variety of luxury villas, super-runnings and encounter your beloved confidante. Experience the life surrounded by rich and beautiful women, marrry your love to enhance your strength.

[Make full use of your mind to deal with the crafty men and become a man who can operate the market]
Create your own business empire, during this process, you will have to recognize the swindles and face the case for your development. Make corresponding strategize to solve these and build up your own commercial peak.

Game features:
Cultivation system, from private small bosses to global economic leaders, to make you feel the fun of ultimate commercial expansion.
Beauty system, nurse, stewardess, business woman, football baby, you will select them as an employee? Be a secretary? Or make them become your lover, It's all your decision.
The mission system, the diverse mission system, and the rich distribution of benefits make your business expansion path never be boring.
The plot system,in the interlocking level plot, you may save the beauty by accident, encounter your first love, which can make you enjoy it.

※ Customer service email: highsocietycsonline@gmail.com
